sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO DEDUCT_NOTICE( BBS_ID, BBS_NAME, ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_TEXT, CREATE_TIME, RDCOUNT, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_NAME, CATEGORY, USE_AT )
VALUES ( 'DEDUCT_NOTICE', '공제소식 게시판', #articleNo#, #title#, #contentHtml#, #contentText#, sysdate, 0, #writerId#, #writerName#, #writerId#, #writerName#, sysdate, #atchFileId#, #atchFileName#, #category#, 'Y' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DEDUCT_NOTICE SET MODIFY_ID = #modifyId#, MODIFY_NAME = #modifyName#, TITLE = #title#, CONTENT_HTML = #contentHtml#, CONTENT_TEXT = #contentText#, MODIFY_TIME = sysdate, ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#, ATCH_FILE_NAME = #atchFileName# WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#
UPDATE DEDUCT_NOTICE SET RDCOUNT = RDCOUNT+1 WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#
UPDATE DEDUCT_NOTICE SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BBS_ID, BBS_NAME, ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_TEXT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_TIME, RDCOUNT, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_NAME, CATEGORY, USE_AT FROM DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#

SELECT BBS_ID, BBS_NAME, ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_TEXT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_TIME, RDCOUNT, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_NAME, CATEGORY, USE_AT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND USE_AT='Y'
(TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%' OR CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') AND USE_AT='Y'
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
(OPEN_YN != 'Y' or OPEN_YN is null)
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ARTICLE_NO DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND USE_AT='Y'
(TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') OR (CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') AND USE_AT='Y'
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
(OPEN_YN != 'Y' or OPEN_YN is null)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DEDUCT_NOTICE SET ATCH_FILE_ID = NULL WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo# AND USE_AT='N'
sqlMap.select: select next_ARTICLE_NO as ARTICLE_NO, next_TITLE as TITLE from ( select ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, lead(ARTICLE_NO,1,NULL) over (order by ARTICLE_NO) next_ARTICLE_NO, lead(TITLE,1,'이전글이 없습니다') over (order by ARTICLE_NO) next_TITLE from DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE USE_AT='Y' ) where ARTiCLE_NO = #articleNo#

select pre_ARTICLE_NO as ARTICLE_NO, pre_TITLE as TITLE from ( select ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, lag(ARTICLE_NO,1,NULL) over (order by ARTICLE_NO) pre_ARTICLE_NO, lag(title,1,'다음글이 없습니다') over (order by ARTICLE_NO) pre_TITLE from DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE USE_AT='Y' ) where ARTiCLE_NO = #articleNo#

SELECT ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, CREATE_TIME, USE_AT, ATCH_FILE_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ARTICLE_NO,TITLE,CREATE_TIME,USE_AT, ATCH_FILE_ID
FROM DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE OPEN_YN IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ARTICLE_NO,TITLE,CREATE_TIME,USE_AT, ATCH_FILE_ID FROM INSURANCE_NOTICE )A WHERE 1=1 AND USE_AT ='Y' AND ARTICLE_NO != #MINUSNO# ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC, ARTICLE_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8 and RNUM > 0

SELECT ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_TIME, USE_AT, ATCH_FILE_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ARTICLE_NO,TITLE,CREATE_TIME,USE_AT, ATCH_FILE_ID
FROM DEDUCT_NOTICE WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT ARTICLE_NO,TITLE,CREATE_TIME,USE_AT, ATCH_FILE_ID FROM INSURANCE_NOTICE WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID IS NOT NULL )A WHERE USE_AT ='Y' AND A.ATCH_FILE_ID = (SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID= A.ATCH_FILE_ID AND FILE_SN='0' ) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC, ARTICLE_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1 and RNUM > 0
